sentences.english: Researches show that Valeriana is a kind of herbal medicine with exploiture future and worthy of researching farther.
sentences.chinese: 纈草是很具有開發前途的中草藥，值得進一步研究。

sentences.english: Valerian is one of the most common sleep remedies for insomnia.
sentences.chinese: 纈草纈草是治療不眠症的最常見的補眠措施之一。

sentences.english: Valerian is one of the most common sleep remedies for insomnia.
sentences.chinese: 纈草纈草是治療不眠症的最常見的補眠措施之一。

sentences.english: Valerian is a safe and effective sedative with reliable results for most kids.
sentences.chinese: 纈草是安全有效的鎮靜劑，對大多數兒童很有效。

sentences.english: To investigate the inhibitory effects of the volatile oil from Valeriana officinalis L.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討纈草油的抑菌活性。

sentences.english: Aim To study the extraction process of Valeriana ofecnilis L.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究纈草的提取工藝。

sentences.english: Valerian Nighttime contains lemon balm extract to soothe the stomach before bedtime.
sentences.chinese: 纈草夜間香蜂草提取物含有舒緩睡前胃。

sentences.english: Objective: To observe the protective effects of valerian extract on experimental rabbits in myocardial ischemia reperfusion model.
sentences.chinese: 瞭解纈草提取物對心肌缺血再灌注損傷的保護作用。
